text: - [Narrator] Previously, Stephanie brought

Graham's soccer commentary
app to a huge audience.
It delivers insightful, live commentary
to large numbers of users.
Stephanie realizes that
as well as listening
to the commentary audio,
an even greater number of people could
be tuning in via social media feeds,
viewing a second screen,

or catching highlight
notifications while on the move.
AWS gives the pair the tools
to adjust their game plan on the fly.
Thanks to Bedrock and Lambda's integration
with Amazon Polly,

Stephanie and Graham can
combine real-time data streams,
outputting commentary

in multiple languages
across blogs, news segments,
and even 280-character

social media posts filtered
the brim with excitement.
The app Stephanie and Graham created

now delivers play by play,
action-packed live stats,

and detailed analysis to
soccer fans around the world.
Great job.
